name: Sujay M Patel
summary: I am a team-oriented accountant who prepares clear, comprehensive financial reports for executive-level management. I have experience as an Account Manager in India for private sector companies and have also worked in the financial sector. I am now seeking an entry-level position based on my studies in the United States.

experience.title: Account cum Finance Executive
experience.description: General Ledger scrutiny; purchase and verification of bills; sales reporting; verification of supplier, contractor and transporter bills; expenditure verification; maintain daily stock; booking of foreign inward remittance and buyers' credit payments; monthly audits; knowledge of LC and export packing credit; bank guarantees; TDS and VAT; service tax filings; C forms; finalization of accounts/audit; assisted senior with finalization and preparation of P&L and Balance Sheet.

experience.title: Account Cum Finance Manager
experience.company: RB Cars Pvt. Ltd (Maruti Suzuki Authorized Dealer)
experience.description: Handled all accounts and finance activities; maintained two types of accounts per Income Tax and Maruti Suzuki India Ltd; contributed to long-term fund planning; prepared documentation for TA and inventory funding; negotiated interest rates with financial institutions; responsible for VAT assessment; provisional balance sheet; tax-related activities including Service Tax, TDS, VAT; filing returns; stock management; cash credit documentation.

experience.title: Account Cum Finance Manager
experience.description: Maintained general ledger accounts including cash, inventory, prepaid, fixed assets; handled accounts payable, accrued expenses, and line of credit transactions; knowledge of taxation laws; VAT assessment; prepared provisional balance sheet; assisted with tax filings; ensured regulatory compliance; involved in budgeting and forecasting.
